description:
STEELE REALTY are proud to bring to the market this dual income investment property.
This unique dual living property offers the buyer many options when it comes to a fantastic lifestyle here on the beautiful Sunshine Coast. The tenants in both units have just re-signed new leases up to January 2024. An option down the track is to live in one and rent out the other, or this could be the perfect holiday property to use one unit for holidays while getting an income from the other or simply rent out both.
Less than a ten-minute drive to the beach and within proximity to three schools and all amenities Peregian Springs has to offer. Less than a 20-minute drive to Noosa or the Sunshine Coast airport.
Unit 1 is the larger unit which has 3 bedrooms, the master having a walk-in robe and ensuite. The main bathroom has a bath, shower and vanity with a separate toilet, double garage with internal access, separate laundry, grass area at the back of the property ideal for kids and pets, air conditioning in the living room, ceiling fans throughout and is rented out at $540 per week until January 2024.
Unit 2 has 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom with shower, vanity and toilet, laundry is in the single garage with internal access, study nook, air conditioning in living room and a ceiling fan in the bedroom. This unit is rented out at $410 per week until January 2024.
PROPERTY FEATURES INCLUDE
• Current income $950 per week.
• Only one set of council rates to pay.
• Low body corp fees.
• Both units tenanted until January 2024.
• Built in 2016, low maintenance easy care property.
• Close to 3 schools and all amenities.
• Less than a 10-minute drive to the beach.
Dual living properties do not come on the market everyday so if you are looking for a low maintenance investment property you need to contact Murray now before it’s too late.
DISCLAIMER
Whilst due diligence has been taken to prepare and collate the property information, Steele Realty and their representatives accept no responsibility for any error, omission, or mis-statement. We highly recommend that all purchasers conduct their own enquiries.
